Name: Prism of Illusion - Rare
Description: After defeating the corresponding boss monster in the wild or in the Stimen Vaults, opening the loot has a chance to obtain it. It is an exquisite material mainly used for crafting "Ultimate" type Battle Imagine.
Description$english: After defeating the corresponding boss monster in the wild or in the Stimen Vaults, opening the loot has a chance to obtain it. It is an exquisite material mainly used for crafting "Ultimate" type Battle Imagine.
Description2$english: A peculiar thread, interwoven with colors, as if the rainbow after the rain has been shattered and re-woven. Even the most skilled weaver cannot replicate its brilliance. It seems to have slipped through a gap in some illusion, quietly arriving with the lingering warmth of thoughts.
